Energy Storage Solutions

Ensirius

Degradation-free energy storage for BTS sites, data centers, and fixed-line network applications.

At a glance

Key product details for quick comparison.

Segment

Telecom (BTS, data centers, fixed-line networks)

Key differentiators

Projected 500,000 cycles, projected 25-year calendar life, high-rate 48V module.

Technology

Electrostatic, encapsulated capacitor storage (non-chemical).

Module

8 kWh, 48 V (voltage range 44-55 Vdc).

Benefits

  • Degradation-free cycling for critical telecom uptime.
  • High-rate charge and discharge capability.
  • Built-in monitoring with WiFi communications.
  • Long projected service life with stable performance.

Use cases

BTS backup power

Data centers

Fixed-line network applications

Technical specs

Module energy 8 kWh (48 V)
Voltage range 44-55 Vdc
Max continuous charge/discharge 250 A
Projected cycle life 500,000 cycles
Projected calendar life 25 years
Communications WiFi

Specifications vary by model and configuration; refer to datasheets.

Downloads and resources

  • ENSIRIUS module technical datasheet (PDF) Datasheet
  • ENSIRIUS module user manual (PDF) Manual
